explanation: [0-0] A man in a pink jacket, blue jeans, and a pink hat stands on stage, bending over, hands on his knees, grinning at the audience. The stage backdrop is a blue screen with a red and white cartoon pattern in the center, surrounded by blue lights. The audience sits below the stage, and several lines of white subtitles appear at the top of the screen.

[0-4] The man bends over, claps his hands on his knees, opens his arms, kicks his feet forward, and steps back towards the rear of the stage. At this moment, white subtitles appear at the bottom of the screen, reading "Com vces Monica Toy!", then disappear. The man continues to open his arms, swaying from side to side as he retreats backward on the stage, then turns his body to the right side of the screen.

[4-11] Immediately, four puppets emerge from both sides of the screen, dressed in yellow, red, and green tops with black shorts, and one in a yellow top with red and black plaid overalls. The red puppet holds a blue rabbit doll. The puppets disperse on stage and dance. The man retreats to the back of the stage, dancing with the puppets and quickly moving towards the right side of the screen. The screen changes from blue to white, displaying cartoon characters in red clothes and a blue rabbit, then transitions to a blue badminton court. Some audience members applaud below the stage, while others film with their phones. The stage lights flicker.

[11-13] The scene cuts to the man and the puppet in the yellow top. The man holds a red hammer in his hands, swinging it from side to side in front of him, his legs bouncing. [13-15] Then, a puppet in a green top and black shorts dances on stage, kicking its left leg forward and retracting it, then alternating steps. The screen transforms into a dark green background with an airplane pattern.

[15-18] Next, the man reappears with the puppet in the red clothes holding the blue rabbit. They spin, exchanging positions with open arms. The screen changes to an alternating colorful rabbit pattern. The lights continuously flash and change.

[18-20] The man reappears, this time with the puppet in the yellow top and red plaid skirt. The man holds tambourines, stepping forward alternately, dancing joyfully.
